Sequence Information.Peptide Name: sHR2-2(derived from SARS-CoV spike protein heptad repeat)
Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from SARS-CoV spike protein heptad repeat)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.15150417]SARS-CoV:inhibition of virus infection in Vero cells(EC50=24 ± 2.8 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide exhibits antiviral activity by competitive binding to the HR2 region of the SARS-CoV spike protein, thus blocking the formation of the six-helix bundle and consequently membrane fusion.

Literature.Title: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV) infection inhibition using spike protein heptad repeat-derived peptides.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2004 Jun 1;101(22)8455-60.
Literature.Author: Bosch BJ, Martina BE, Van Der Zee R, Lepault J, Haijema BJ, Versluis C, Heck AJ, De Groot R, Osterhaus AD, Rottier PJ.
